author: newsr.in
title: Ticks Known to Carry Lyme Disease Discovered in London Parks
text: A report published in today's issue of the journal Medical and Veterinary Entomology cautions that, as revealed by a recent investigation carried out by scientists at the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine, there are ticks known to carry Lyme disease in London parks. The research focused on a total of four parks in South ... Â»
